event Added(string streamId, address indexed nodeAddress)
event Removed(string streamId, address indexed nodeAddress)
function addAndRemoveStorageNodes(string streamId, address[] addNodes, address[] removeNodes)
function initialize(address streamRegistryAddress, address nodeRegistryAddress, address trustedForwarderAddress)
function isStorageNodeOf(string streamId, address nodeAddress) view returns (bool)
function pairs(string, address) view returns (uint256 dateCreated)
function upgradeToAndCall(address newImplementation, bytes data) payable
